loadItem

public boolean loadItem(Item item)
Template method implemented for concrete ReadStore implementer's convenience Test if the item has been loaded , and if not try to load the item. If it loads it, it notify the itemFetchListeners.

Specified by:
loadItem in interface DataStore
See Also:
com.objetdirect.tatami.client.data.ReadStore#loadItem(com.objetdirect.tatami.client.data.Item, com.objetdirect.tatami.client.data.LoadItemListener)

loadItemImpl

public abstract boolean loadItemImpl(Item item)
This method has to be implemented by data store implementors. It permits to load an Item if it has to. (Exemple : if the item is just a "stub" for a real item, containing only an attribute reffering to how to load the other ones (an url for exemple)).

Parameters:
item - : the item to load
Returns:
true if the item has been loaded , false otherwise.

isItemLoaded

public abstract boolean isItemLoaded(Item item)
Specified by:
isItemLoaded in interface DataStore
Parameters:
item - : the item to test
Returns:
true if the item has already been loaded, false otherwise

getDojoName

public java.lang.String getDojoName()
Description copied from interface: HasDojo
Returns the name of the dojo widget example : FisheyeList This method is used to load the scripts JavaScript for Dojo and create the dojo widget. See the Dojo documentation to know the good name.

Specified by:
getDojoName in interface HasDojo
Returns:
the name of dojo widget

onDojoLoad

public void onDojoLoad()
Description copied from interface: HasDojo
This method executes the Java instrcutions or JavaScript (with JSNI ). This should be called after that the scripts JavaScript needed for the widget Dojo are loaded. It's not necessary to implement this method every time it depends of the widget Dojo to integrate.

Specified by:
onDojoLoad in interface HasDojo

doBeforeDestruction

public void doBeforeDestruction()
Description copied from interface: HasDojo
Do something before the desctruction of the Dojo widget, use this method to free some memory tp prevent memory leak. Don't use directly this method, use a Dojo controller instead : DojoController

Specified by:
doBeforeDestruction in interface HasDojo

createDojoWidget

public void createDojoWidget()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: HasDojo
Creates the widget Dojo using JSNI for the most of the cases. This method is not to be executed directly in your widget GWT, a controller has to execute it.

Specified by:
createDojoWidget in interface HasDojo
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the dojo widget can't be created. Warning, check the parameters and their type of JavaScript objects when JSNI is used. A JavaScript error can cause a fatal failure for the module.
